name: Shane Robinson
body:
## Hi.
Thank you for visiting my personal site.  Right now it is only a single page, but over the coming weeks I plan on expanding it.  It will include more about me, a personal blog covering things from solutions I've discovered to tech problems, gaming and more, and a more detailed description of my work experience than can be found on my resume.

### Projects
I currently have three projects I am working on.  One is expanding this one page site out.  For now I am using the automatic page generator on GitHub, which does a pretty nifty job of letting you format the pages and selecting templates for layout.

Project number two was inspired by my latest job.  It will utilize Java and MySQL. I chose Java or two reasons: I have done more playing around with it than I have C++ or C#, and I don't want to admit to knowing VB; this project originally was targeted at an OS X environment while I wanted to develop from Windows and Linux.  I chose MySQL as it appeared from my research to be fairly stable, widely used (and thus more likely to have someone be able to support it after I left).

Finally, project number three is setting up two virtual machines, one a Windows Server 2008 and the other Windows Server 2012.  I'll use these to learn Active Directory and likely set up one of them to run SQL Server.

### Work Experience
I will soon be including my resume and work experience.

### Finally...
Thank you for stopping by.  I hope you come back to visit again.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
